TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Peru, title = Peru, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peru} }

S.FORM: = Peru = Gaga kska Kska- Hunac Meycow ka Peru, 10 00 S, 76 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 1,285,216 sq km(hangan na o Tg20) (knlbanga dxgal o 1,279,996 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 5,220 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 30,741,062 hiyi. Gaga Lima ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 28 idas 7 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Peru ga wada sugan 18.80% ka dxgal qpahan, 53% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 28.20% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Pedro Pablo Kuczynski, pnaah hngkawas2016 idas 7 jiyax 28pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru'

= Pero = Gaga kska Kska- Honac Meycow ka Pero, 10 00 S, 76 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 1,285,216 sq km(hangan na o Tg20) (knlbanga dxgal o 1,279,996 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 5,220 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 30,741,062 hiyi. Gaga Lima ka poso alang paro, jiyax 28 idas 7 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Pero ga wada sogan 18.80% ka dxgal qpahan, 53% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 28.20% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Pedro Pablo Koczynski, pnaah hngkawas2016 idas 7 jiyax 28pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro'
